name: SK8 Free - Skater Street Skills Freestyle Skateboarding Games
name_original: SK8 Free - Skater Street Skills Freestyle Skateboarding Games
description:
Grab your skateboard and hit the streets! Twist, turn, and jump your way over everything that comes your way. Featuring super easy controls and hilarious sound effects, you'll be left wanting more!

FEATURES

- Simple controls! tilt to steer, tap to jump, swipe for high jump.
- Lots of fun obstacles to avoid and jump over.
- Fun soundtrack with lots of funny sound effects.
- Gamecenter support.
